correctness.rationale: Major factual and schema issues. While PEALD method, precursors (DEZ + oxygen plasma), carrier/purging gas (N2), and deposition temperature (150 °C) match the article, many other fields are incorrect, untraceable, or violate the schema. Key problems: (1) Dosing/purge times use unit MilliSEC but numeric values from the article are in seconds; should be 3000 ms (DEZ), 5000 ms (O2 plasma), and 6000 ms purge, not 3, 5, 6. (2) Substrate is set to 'Si' but deposition was on ZnO-buffer/Si. (3) plasmaPower is set to null, which violates the schema (if present it must be a valid object); the article does not report plasma power—omit the field or provide a sourced value. (4) Numerous parameters are fabricated and not traceable to the article: reactor details, pressure (0.1 mmHg), flow rates (10/50/100 sccm), growth per cycle, number of cycles, film thickness (100 nm), nucleation period, uniformity, conformality, refractive index, absorption coefficient, band gap and ‘Tauc plot’ method, film density (also wrong unit context—reported as GM-PER-DeciM3 implying g/L), electrical properties (resistivity, carrier density, mobility), and all deviceProperties (mobility, Vth, SS, on/off, structure). (5) SupercycleDesign is included without basis in the text. (6) Many values (e.g., XPS composition 50% and 1:1 ratio) are not reported. Correct or remove all unsubstantiated values; fix units for dosing/purge times; set substrate to ZnO-buffer/Si; omit plasmaPower or provide a sourced value. The only clearly supported material property is the AFM roughness of 18.62 nm (for the film on the 750 °C-annealed buffer) and the c-axis oriented polycrystalline nature from XRD.

completeness.rationale: The extraction is largely incomplete and not traceable to the article, with several schema issues. Key problems: (1) Multiple processes not captured: the article reports ZnO ALD on ZnO-buffer/Si with four distinct buffer annealing conditions (as-grown, 600, 750, 900 °C) plus a post-deposition anneal; only a single process is provided. (2) Many values are fabricated or untraceable: pressure (0.1 mmHg), flow rates (sccm), growth-per-cycle, number of cycles, film thickness, saturation, nucleation period, uniformity, conformality, film density, XPS composition, refractive index, absorption, band gap (Tauc), electrical and device properties are not reported in the article. These should be removed or left unspecified rather than invented. (3) Clear unit/value errors: dosing/purge times are given in milliseconds but the article specifies seconds (3 s DEZ, 5 s O2 plasma, 6 s purge). (4) Internal inconsistency: GPC 0.1 Å × 1000 cycles ≠ 100 nm (it equals 10 nm). (5) Schema violation: plasmaPower is set to null despite method = PEALD; if unknown, omit the field rather than setting null. (6) Substrate detail is incomplete: substrate is ZnO-buffer/Si, not just Si. (7) Traceability gaps: reactor details marked “Not Found” are acceptable as unknowns, but numerous filled values (e.g., pressure, flows, device metrics) are not supported by the article. To improve, add separate process entries for each buffer anneal condition; correct dosing/purge time units; restrict fields to values explicitly reported (precursors, PEALD, 150 °C, N2 carrier/purge, pulse times, AFM roughness values, XRD-based crystallinity). Remove or leave unspecified unsupported required fields (e.g., filmComposition, uniformity, conformality, filmDensity), or supply them only if the article provides data.
